code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Box,Chip,TextField,IconButton}from'@mui/material';import AddIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Add';import DeleteIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Delete';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ArrayChipInput=_ref=>{let{label,value,onChange}=_ref;const[input,setInput]=useState('');const handleAdd=()=>{if(input.trim()&&!value.includes(input.trim())){onChange([...value,input.trim()]);setInput('');}};const handleDelete=chip=>{onChange(value.filter(v=>v!==chip));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',gap:1,mb:1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:label,value:input,onChange:e=>setInput(e.target.value),size:"small",onKeyDown:e=>{if(e.key==='Enter'){e.preventDefault();handleAdd();}}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{color:"primary",onClick:handleAdd,size:"small",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddIcon,{})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',flexWrap:'wrap',gap:1},children:value.map((chip,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chip,{label:chip,onDelete:()=>handleDelete(chip),deleteIcon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteIcon,{})},chip+idx))})]});};export default ArrayChipInput;
